text:
Vimbly, New York, NY (Onsite full time and interns)

https://www.vimbly.com

Positions:

* PHP Developer (Back-end LAMP stack)

* Front End Developer

Join a team of 10 developers working on projects of all sizes.

More info: https://www.vimbly.com/careers

Hiring process - Resume, 20 min phone interview, 1 hour technical interview with a coding exercise, in-office interview.

Email dev-recruiting@vimbly.com and include HN + the position you're applying for in the subject line.
